channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I cant believe my baby is not going to be here' - mother of fire victim
item.description: Shelley Sykes' son Rory, who had cerebral palsy and struggled with mobility, chose to not to follow an evacuation order.

item.title: 1/12: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Eaton Fire hits historically Black neighborhoods; A look at the efforts to save pets and animals from the California wildfires

item.title: Mexico offers up to $1,300 to get guns off the street
item.description: The plan, called "Yes to Disarmament, Yes to Peace," will offer cash to those who anonymously leave weapons at designated drop-off locations.

item.title: Landslides kill at least 10 in Brazil's Minas Gerais state
item.description: The landslides were triggered by torrential rain which fell in the city in the early hours of Sunday.

item.title: The first full moon of 2025 is here
item.description: This moon phase is nicknamed the Wolf Moon, which is rooted in Native American culture.

item.title: Suspect in ex-lawmaker's assassination says he acted out of "gratitude"
item.description: Lim Kimya was gunned down by a motorcyclist as he arrived in Bangkok by bus from Cambodia with his French wife.

item.title: The California wildfires could be leaving deeper inequality in their wake

item.title: Despite Trump's win, 'election integrity' activists still seek sweeping voting changes
item.description: Republican voters say they trust the 2024 election was administered well, yet pro-Trump conservatives are pushing some sweeping reforms to voting syst...

item.title: Blue Origin postpones first launch of its massive new rocket
item.description: Blue Origin called off the debut launch of its massive New Glenn rocket due to technical trouble. The Jeff Bezos-founded company didn't set a new laun...

item.title: A dad and daughter help evacuees learn whether their homes survived the California wildfires
Nigeria military kills 16 civilians in air strike 'mistake'
item.description: The villagers were reportedly returning from a mission to chase away armed groups when they were bombed.

item.title: See some of the most terrifying and dramatic pictures of California wildfire devastation
item.description: These photos chronicle the catastrophic scale of destruction from wildfires in California that started on January 7.

item.title: Weird weather isn't always because of climate change â€” but sometimes it is
item.description: Sometimes, weather is just weather. And other times human-caused climate change had an obvious impact.

item.title: Oliviero Toscani, Benetton's shock photographer, dies aged 82
item.description: Toscani was the creative force behind shock ad campaigns of the 1990s including a priest and nun kissing.

item.title: Trump's return puts Medicaid on the chopping block
item.description: Republicans in Washington are working on plans to shrink Medicaid, the nearly $900-billion-a-year government health insurance program that covers 1 in...

item.title: AfD embraces mass deportation of migrants as German election nears
item.description: During a party conference Alice Weidel publicly endorsed the mass "return" or deportation of people with a migrant background.

item.title: Los Angeles wildfire death toll surges to 24 as firefighters brace for more fierce winds
item.description: A surging death toll is accompanying a slight break in the weather as firefighters in Los Angeles cast a wary eye on a forecast for yet more wind.
